text: Sun Chunlan (; born 24 May 1950) is a Chinese politician. She was a member of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party, and a Vice Premier of the People's Republic of China. Between 2014 and 2017, she served as head of the United Front Work Department of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Vice Premiers of the People's Republic of China Category:People from Hebei
title: Sun Chunlan
